intro.speaker: Ezra
intro.line: All alone are you lamb? Off searching for dear old mum? How very sweet. But the world's a dangerous place my dear, full of wolves waiting to snatch you up.

intro.speaker: Noire
intro.line: Um... th-thank you for the warning, sir, b-but...

intro.speaker: Ezra
intro.line: That's no warning, lamb. I'm a wolf, and you've been snatched! Now come quietly. Scars tend to lower the sale price.

intro.speaker: Chrom
intro.line: We'll have to hurry if we hope to catch them.

intro.speaker: Tharja
intro.line: Or we could stay here and just let me go to work on them. A curse to wither them away, perhaps? A slow death over a year? Oh, fie. Let's make it two.

intro.speaker: Chrom
intro.line: I think their captive would likely appreciate something a bit more immediate. Shepherds! Saving the girl is our top priority! Now move out!

battle.speaker: Noire
battle.line: It's over... My life is over... Mother, I'll be by your side soon...

battle.speaker: Noire
battle.line: So this is how it ends... Killed... or worse. A clean death would be a mercy compared to what awaits... Huh? What's this? An old bow? Hmm, the string's still taut. I suppose I could use this to try and fight my way out. B-but those bandits are so strong and scary and... W-wait! My talisman! Let me just grab my talisman and then... ...... ...I AM THE FIRE AND FURY! ALL WHO DEFY ME WILL PERISH! REPENT, SCUM! REPENT THOUGH IT WILL SAVE YOU NOT! REPENT AND DESPAIR! BWAAA HA HA HA HA!

end.speaker: Noire
end.line: Oh, thank you! Thank you so much! Had you not saved me, I... I fear to even think what would have happened...

end.speaker: Chrom
end.line: It's all right, take it easy. No one's going to hurt you now.

end.speaker: Noire
end.line: *Sniff* P-please, sir... Let me come with you. There's someone I need to talk to, but I'm s-scared to be alone...

end.speaker: Tharja
end.line: What do you want?

end.speaker: Noire
end.line: I, um... I mean... Er... H-here, please look at this.

end.speaker: Tharja
end.line: Nice ring. Looks just like mine. You messing around with alchemy? Or is this something... darker?

end.speaker: Noire
end.line: Wha--? N-no! It's nothing of the sort! It's just...

end.speaker: Tharja
end.line: Tell me the truth, girl. You don't want to see what happens if you lie to me.

end.speaker: Noire
end.line: P-please, just give me... I n-need a moment... M-my talisman... Wh-where is my talisman... ......

end.speaker: Noire
end.line: I AM BLOOD AND THUNDER! I AM A RIGHTEOUS FURY! ...I AM YOUR FUTURE DAUGHTER!

end.speaker: Tharja
end.line: You are trying my patience.

end.speaker: Noire
end.line: INSOLENCE! I speak the truth! The ring I bear also hails from the future. A memento of you, my departed mother!

end.speaker: Tharja
end.line: And that bizarre talisman?

end.speaker: Noire
end.line: Your own handiwork! Wrought to steel the mewling heart of your coward daughter! In its strength did I find blessed escape from grief and solitude! Fear of death and killing, too, it drove from me, until I became an avatar of retribution! Only by clinging to it have I survived the crushing desolation of a ruinated future! BWAA HA HA HA HA!

end.speaker: Tharja
end.line: Oh, give me that.

end.speaker: Noire
end.line: Um, w-wait! I need that! Without it, I can't--

end.speaker: Tharja
end.line: Survive? You can and will. And not by becoming some avatar of retribution. Just be my daughter. Leave the retribution to me.

end.speaker: Noire
end.line: M-Mother...

end.speaker: Tharja
end.line: My, this is a nasty little number. The future me is good. ...And very, very bad. Hee hee. I can't wait.

end.speaker: Noire
end.line: M-Mother, you're f-frightening me! ...A-again!

end.speaker: Tharja
end.line: This little trinket will advance my research in the dark arts nicely... Hmm... You have my blood, right? I'm going to need a bit of it back.

end.speaker: Noire
end.line: Aaaaiiieee! I... I mean... BLEED ME DRY AND I SHALL BE AS THUNDER STILL!

end.speaker: Tharja
end.line: See. No daughter of mine needs some mummer's prop to be strong. Hee... Hee hee...

end.speaker: Noire
end.line: BWAAA HA HA HA HA!

end.speaker: Tharja
end.line: Eee hee hee hee hee!

end.speaker: Chrom
end.line: Oh, this is just wonderful...
